rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev026101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Dorothy about equipment.

rows.label: tev026101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev026101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Dorothy if anything is on her mind.

rows.label: tev026101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Dorothy about mimeosomes.

rows.label: tev026101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Dorothy if anything is on her mind.

rows.label: tev026101_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Dorothy about recent developments.

rows.label: tev026101_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Dorothy about mimeosomes.

rows.label: tev026101_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Dorothy about recent developments.

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0001
rows.name:
When you're picking out your BLADE wear,
don't let appearances steer you wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0002
rows.name:
I found the most darling headgear and decided to
order a sample, but when I tried it on, I could feel it
sucking the energy right out of me. Awful merchandise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Who cares how equipment looks if wearing it's literally
a drag? Navigating fashion doesn't get any easier on a
new planet, I'll tell you what.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0051
rows.name:
Now that you mention it, I noticed this BLADE lurking
around the shop a while back, although he never came
inside.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0052
rows.name:
I wonder if he was too embarrassed?
Regardless, I haven't seen him in a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0053
rows.name:
I've been talking with Liviana to see if we can make
our shop more unisex. I doubt the boss wants to lose
any potential customers![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0101
rows.name:
Did you know you're allowed to ask for bells and
whistles when you make a mimeosome?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0102
rows.name:
So if you want, you can erase a beer belly or say
so long to wrinkles that have always bothered you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0103
rows.name:
There's even a rumor going around that some people
managed to get mimeosomes that look much younger
than their actual age.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0104
rows.name:
Still, it's not really a big deal. I mean, we'll all be back
in our real bodies eventually, right? Let the would-be
butterflies have their moment, I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0151
rows.name:
Now that you mention it, I noticed this BLADE lurking
around the shop a while back, although he never came
inside.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0152
rows.name:
I wonder if he was too embarrassed?
Regardless, I haven't seen him in a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0153
rows.name: Oh, and he had a Pathfinder insignia on his shoulder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0154
rows.name:
If you know the guy, could you tell him he's welcome
to stop in?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0351
rows.name:
For the longest time, I was scared of finding the
Lifehold Core and getting my body back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0352
rows.name:
I mean, think about it. Mimeosomes don't age.
You can stay forever young if you want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0353
rows.name:
But the more I talk to Shingo, the more I warm up
to the idea of leaving this shell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0354
rows.name:
With real bodies, he and I can grow old together.
And that's an incredibly beautiful thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0401
rows.name:
You know, when you think about it, it's scary.
Mimeosomes never age, and any damage can be
wiped away like it never happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0402
rows.name:
And yet we do the same things day after day,
which ultimately runs the risk of stagnation.
Oh, and we can't have children, either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0403
rows.name:
I'm basically trapped in time until we find the
Lifehold Core...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0404
rows.name:
We can't keep living like this. We just can't.
Promise me you'll find the Core soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0451
rows.name: Shingo's dead... I heard from another BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0452
rows.name:
He told me that mimeosomes were supposed to be
impossible to kill like that. What happened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0453
rows.name:
Part of me wants to go to the Lifehold Core the second
we find it so I can be there when he comes back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026101_MSG0454
rows.name:
Maybe he'll be mad at me for not staying in the city
where it's safe, but I don't care.[ST:wait ]
